changelog.change: You can now configure the specific zones to be automatically split on through the Settings menu. Previously, automatic splits were done on a limited set of hardcoded act entrance zones.
Fix bug with unrecognized zones introduced in previous update.
Fix autosplitting and load removal for Steam users.
Add option to autosplit on Labyrinth zones for Lab speedrunning.
Update list of zones to split on for the Fall of Oriath.
Add ability to automatically generate splits from selected zones.
Changed lab speedrunning to start the timer automatically upon entering the first lab zone.
Fix autosplitting after log line removal in patch 3.2.2c.
Added an option to autosplit on levels.
Added an option to generate splits with zone icons.
Changed lab speedrunning to start the timer automatically upon using the lab activation device.
Added an option to only split on Aspirant's Trial zones for lab speedrunning.
